== ISO Testing Cadence ==
This page contains a list of users committed to the iso in question for the quantal cycle. Every two weeks, according the the Community Testing column on the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QuantalQuetzal/ReleaseInterlock|Release Interlock]]</nowiki> page the testcases for the iso will be run and results reported to the isotracker. Users are also encouraged to subscribe and read the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-quality|ubuntu-quality mailing list]]</nowiki> for more information during the cycle. Please add your name under any iso you wish to adopt for the cycle in this way :-)

More information on how to test and best practices can be found <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/ISO/Procedures|here]]</nowiki>. It's recommended you use <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/ZsyncCdImage|zsync]]</nowiki> to save time and bandwidth when re-downloading the images. If you're testing utilizing a virtual machine, <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QATeam/Testdrive|testdrive]]</nowiki> is a great tool to combine using the virtual machine and zsync. It makes everything about configuring and launching the machine automagic.
